document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">good </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">Flower </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Man </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">possess </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">first </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">present </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Certificate </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">minted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">Holiness. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The good will of a flower
